custom-action.name: SetFocus GuiCTextField (GuiCTextField - VBAP-VRKME)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates a set focus action on an SAP GUI object.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/". - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
